goal.en: The evolution of human civilization depends on the writing and spread of knowledge. The goals of this course are: 1. Students can become familiar with smart writing and communication, and finally think and learn knowledge through writing. 2. Students can set learning and writing goals according to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). 3. Students can review and provide in-depth comments on selected articles 4. Students can produce their own articles or video clips for knowledge communication and finally try to publish them publicly. 5. Students can continue to read, think, and create informative articles or video clip
goal.ch: 人類文明的演進有賴知識的寫作與傳播，本課程的目標在於: 1. 學生能熟悉知識的範疇、知識寫作的類型，並且了解新式傳播媒介的文案相關議題，最後藉由寫作來思考與學習知識。 2. 學生能關切聯合國永續發展目標（SDGs），並藉以擬定學習與寫作的目標。 3. 學生能分析與評判知識性文章，與同儕、教師進行深度討論，最後撰寫讀後摘要與評論。 4.學生能撰寫知識傳播的文章或影視作品，並與同儕、教師討論修改作品，最後嘗試公開發表。 5. 期許學生能以「世事洞明皆學問，人情練達即文章」為目標，持續閱讀、思考、創作知識性文章或影視作品。

content.en:
1. Introduction to Smart Writing and Communication Course
2. Introduction to the categories of “knowledge”, ways of “thinking”, and types of “writing and communication”
3. Critical thinking examples I: Writing and thinking on knowledge in humanities and social fields
4. Critical Thinking Example II: Writing and Thinking on Natural Science Knowledge
5. Critical Thinking Example III: Engineering and Technology Knowledge Writing and Thinking
6. Critical Thinking Example IV: Writing and Thinking on Biomedical Science Knowledge
7. Examples of critical thinking V: Knowledge writing and reflection on popular science film and television works
8. Analysis and discussion of special writing communication plan
9. Photography technology guide: software introduction, storyboard and script analysis, sample videos
10. Film and television recording technology guide: software introduction, hardware demonstration, copyright-free music and materials, basic sound architecture
11. Topic Sharing: Chief Editor Keyue
12. Rough film and storyboard practice, sound material collection (1)
13. Rough film and storyboard practice, sound material collection (2)
14. Video editing implementation and narration recording (1)
15. Video editing and narration recording (2)
16. Topic Sharing: Senior Sister’s Inheritance
17. Final report
18. Results presentation meeting
content.ch:
(中文)
1. 智慧寫作與傳播課程簡介
2. 「知識」的範疇、「思考」的方式、和「寫作和傳播」的類型介紹
3. 批判性思考實例 I: 人文社會領域知識寫作與思考
4. 批判性思考實例 II: 自然科學知識寫作與思考
5. 批判性思考實例 III: 工程與技術知識寫作與思考
6. 批判性思考實例 IV: 生醫科學知識寫作與思考
7. 批判性思考實例 V: 科普影視作品之知識寫作文案與思考
8. 專題寫作傳播計畫評析與討論
9. 攝影技術導覽:軟體介紹、分鏡與腳本分析、範例影片
10. 影視錄音技術導覽:軟體介紹、硬體示範、無版權音樂與素材、基礎聲音架構
11. 專題分享: 科月主編
12. 毛片與分鏡實務、聲音素材採集(一)
13. 毛片與分鏡實務、聲音素材採集(二)
14. 影片剪輯實作、旁白錄製(一)
15. 影片剪輯實作、旁白錄製(二)
16. 專題分享:學長姐傳承
17. 期末報告
18. 成果發表會
